store_info.title: Nupay-"THE" UPI app to use
store_info.description:
At nupay, we aim to transform India to a CashLess Society by enabling sellers to accept payments digitally, right into their bank accounts , transacting seamlessly on RBI approved payments platform WITHOUT CASH .
This is being done by allowing customers to pay "Direct-from-Account" leveraging the power of their bank accounts .

So...
No need to top up wallets
No need to take out debit/credit cards
No need to store sensitive information like card details, CVV etc on third party sites
No need to remember lengthy net banking passwords
No need to ask for merchant's Bank A/c number or IFSC code

Just pay the new way, just NUPAY, because we are among the first players in the market with a UPI enabled app


The solution is an end to end innovative payment mechanism for the customers and merchants that allows you to transact 24x7 up to INR 1,00,000 per transaction from ANY bank (http://npci.org.in/UPI_Livemembers.aspx) including weekends and bank holidays

Pay Faster
- Payments with Nupay are Instant !!
- Payments are made direct from your bank account in just a few clicks using IMPS and UPI
- Anytime/Anywhere (including remotely) payments-now pay for that home delivery burger or the office delivered shining new phone from anywhere -home, office, spa, cinema or even the treadmill

Pay Easier
- Multiple modes of making payments to merchants
- Multiple real life use cases including POD* for ecommerce transactions
- One touch payments

Pay Safer
- Multi factor payment authentication
- Uses RBI mandated payment mechanism
- No financial information of customer stored , not even your bank account number (only email and mobile no.)

Pay Lower
- Reduces transaction cost significantly for merchants (including cash handling costs)
- Promotes use of bank account with no loss of interest on your bank deposit-and no cumbersome loading and topping up wallets

Top Quality Support

We have made sure that your experience with Nupay is seamless and extraordinarily simple. However we are here to hold your hand should the need arise . Your suggestions are most welcome and feedback is appreciated.

Would love to meet you on :
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/nupaybiz/
Linkedin :https://goo.gl/WavWB3

You can reach us on www.nupay.co.in
or
mail us on : care@nupay.co.in
store_info.short_description: nupay is an innovative mobile payment solution for payments to physical stores
